record.description: University of Chicago's football future will be largely shaped by these newcomers to the Midway shown at spring practice with Coach Clark Shaughnessy. Left to right are Walter Maurovich, a Chicagoan, who is counted on to plug a gap in the Maroon line; Robert Scott, a transfer student from Dartmouth; Wallace Ottermyer, a fullback; Coach Shaughnessy and Robert Howard of California, an end.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached news clipping, archives stamp. Paint on the surface.
